name: Medium
natural_language_description: 这是 Medium 节点。主要用于: Consume Medium API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: post

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: publication
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many publications

publication.name: publication
publication.description: Whether you are posting for a publication
publication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Publication | 作用: Whether you are posting for a publication | 默认值: False

publicationId.name: publicationId
publicationId.description: Publication IDs. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
publicationId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Publication Name or ID | 作用: Publication IDs. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the post. Max Length : 100 characters.
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the post. Max Length : 100 characters. | (必填项)

contentFormat.name: contentFormat
contentFormat.description: The format of the content to be posted
contentFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content Format | 作用: The format of the content to be posted | (必填项)

content.name: content
content.description: The body of the post, in a valid semantic HTML fragment, or Markdown
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: The body of the post, in a valid semantic HTML fragment, or Markdown | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: canonicalUrl (值: None) - The original home of this content, if it was originally published elsewhere
license (值: None) - License of the post
notifyFollowers (值: None) - Whether to notify followers that the user has published
publishStatus (值: None) - The status of the post
tags (值: None) - Comma-separated strings to be used as tags for post classification. Max allowed tags: 5. Max tag length: 25 characters.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100
